description: rewrite research project summaries to communicate science to a broad audience for DFO
full_summary:
===========================================================

**Government Tender Announcement: Intermediate Technical Writer**
===========================================================

**Title**:
 ------------
Intermediate Technical Writer to Develop/Write Summaries for Research Projects

**Reference Number**:
-------------------
PW-22-01017376

**Solicitation Number**:
---------------------
30003250

**Publication Date**:
-------------------
2022-12-15

**Tender Closing Date**:
---------------------
2023-01-12T14:00:00 (expired)

**Description:**
 Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) requires the services of one (1) intermediate technical writer to develop/write summaries for research projects to communicate science to a broad audience. The summaries will be used to showcase Ecosystem and Ocean Sciences funded projects and Fisheries and Oceans Canada and Government of Canada investments in science.

**Scope of Work:**
------------------

* Develop/write summaries for research projects (from proposals and/or final project reports)
* Communicate science to a broad audience
* Restrict access by posting on the DFO Science website
* Use summaries to showcase Ecosystem and Ocean Sciences funded projects and Fisheries and Oceans Canada and Government of Canada investments in science

**Duration of Contract:**
-------------------------

* From contract award to March 31, 2024
* Option to extend the contract by a one-year period

**Delivery Timeframe:**
---------------------

* From contract award to March 31, 2024
* Option to extend the contract by a one-year period

**Eligibility:**
---------------

* This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders (SA-holders) under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: 3.10 Technical Writer (one (1) intermediate-level resource)
* SA-holders must contact the DFO Procurement Officer to request to be invited
* Suppliers who are not SA-holders must contact PSPC's SA Authority for the TSPS SA to be added for future opportunities

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

* Santos, Glauco
* Email: Glauco.Santos@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Address: 200 Kent St, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0E6, Canada

**Attachments:**
---------------

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/15/97d57e28ee0629009af78
